resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74948</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74948</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f6-a778-452b-2ab4-b66e8e92cef3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Összetett időszalag</string>
            <string language="en">Complex time band</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kompliziertes Zeitband</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bande complexe de temps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faixa complexa do tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fascia complessa di tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθετη χρονική ζώνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Venda compleja del tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Összetett időszalag: az időszalagon megadott események összefüggésében helyezd el a korábbi órákon már szereplő műveket!</string>
            <string language="en">Complex time band: place the works from previous lessons in connection of events given on the time band</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">faszobor,  14.század,  Madonna,  Magyar Nemzeti Galéria,  gótikus szobrászat,  </string>
            <string language="en">statue of wood, 14th century, Madonna, Hungarian National Gallery</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kompliziertes Zeitband: legen Sie die 
Arbeiten von den vorhergehenden Lektionen in Anschluß der Fälle, die
auf das Zeitband gegeben werden</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bande complexe de temps : placez les 
travaux des leçons précédentes dans la connexion des événements 
donnés sur la bande de temps</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faixa complexa do tempo: coloque os 
trabalhos das lições precedentes na conexão dos eventos dados na 
faixa do tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fascia complessa di tempo: disponga gli 
impianti dalle lezioni precedenti nel collegamento degli eventi dati 
sulla fascia di tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνθετη χρονική ζώνη: τοποθετήστε τις εργασίες 
από τα προηγούμενα μαθήματα στη σύνδεση των γεγονότων που 
δίνονται στη χρονική ζώνη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Venda compleja del tiempo: ponga los 
trabajos de lecciones anteriores en la conexión de los 
acontecimientos dados en la venda del tiempo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statue des Holzes, 14. Jahrhundert, Madonna, ungarische 
nationale Galerie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statue de bois, 14ème siècle, Madonna, galerie 
nationale hongroise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estátua da madeira, 1ô século, Madonna, galeria 
nacional hungarian</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statua di legno, quattordicesimo secolo, Madonna, 
galleria nazionale ungherese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άγαλμα του ξύλου, 14$ος αιώνας, Madonna, ουγγρική εθνική
στοά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estatua de la madera, 14to siglo, Madonna, galería 
nacional húngara</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74948</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40aee8f6-a778-452b-2ab4-b66e8e92cef3&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
